price: Vërtet thonë ata[333]: “Ai[334] është vjershëtar, të presim derisa ta zhdukë vdekja”?!
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
